languages.text: "Сестра, признаюсь честно: пока меня нанизывали на шипы словно букашку, я и твое имя успел проклясть несколько раз. Но, когда ты меня с них снимала, одного взгляда на твое лицо было достаточно, чтобы осознать, что ты такая же жертва лжи одного больного ублюдка, как и все мы. Я не виню тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Сестра, признаюсь честно: пока меня нанизывали на шипы словно букашку, я и твое имя успел проклясть несколько раз. Но, когда ты меня с них снимала, одного взгляда на твое лицо было достаточно, чтобы осознать, что ты такая же жертва лжи одного больного ублюдка, как и все мы. Я не виню тебя".
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Sister, I'll be honest with you. When I was there, being skewered on spikes like a bug, I cursed your name too. More than once. But when you were pulling me off those spikes, one look at your face was enough to know that you'd been just as much a victim of that sick man's lies as the rest of us. I do not blame you."
languages.original_text: "Сестра, признаюсь честно: пока меня нанизывали на шипы словно букашку, я и твое имя успел проклясть несколько раз. Но, когда ты меня с них снимала, одного взгляда на твое лицо было достаточно, чтобы осознать, что ты такая же жертва лжи одного больного ублюдка, как и все мы. Я не виню тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Sister, I'll be honest with you. When I was there, being skewered on spikes like a bug, I cursed your name too. More than once. But when you were pulling me off those spikes, it took me a single glance at your face to understand that you'd been just as much of a victim of a sick man's lies as we all. I do not blame you."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "Sister, I'll be honest with you. When I was there, being skewered on spikes like a bug, I cursed your name too. More than once. But when you were pulling me off those spikes, it took me a single glance at your face to understand that you'd been just as much of a victim of a sick man's lies as we all. I do not blame you."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "Sister, I'll be honest with you. When I was there, being skewered on spikes like a bug, I cursed your name too. More than once. But when you were pulling me off those spikes, it took me a single glance at your face to understand that you'd been just as much of a victim of a sick man's lies as we all were. I don't blame you, though."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "Sister, I'll be honest with you. When I was there, being skewered on spikes like a bug, I cursed your name too. More than once. But when you were pulling me off those spikes, it took me a single glance at your face to understand that you'd been just as much of a victim of a sick man's lies as we all were. I don't blame you, though."

traits.locale_text: "Sister, I'll be honest with you. When I was there, being skewered on spikes like a bug, I cursed your name too. More than once. But when you were pulling me off those spikes, one look at your face was enough to know that you'd been just as much a victim of that sick man's lies as the rest of us. I do not blame you."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "Sister, I'll be honest with you. When I was there, being skewered on spikes like a bug, I cursed your name too. More than once. But when you were pulling me off those spikes, one look at your face was enough to know that you'd been just as much a victim of that sick man's lies as the rest of us. I do not blame you."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: 「シスター、正直に言う。虫けらのように串刺しにされたあの時、私もあなたの名前を呪った。何度もな。だが、あなたが私をあの杭から抜いてくれた時、その顔を一目見ただけで、あなたも私たち全員と同じように、狂人の嘘の犠牲者だったのだと理解できた。あなたを責めるつもりはない」
languages.original_text: "Sister, I'll be honest with you. When I was there, being skewered on spikes like a bug, I cursed your name too. More than once. But when you were pulling me off those spikes, one look at your face was enough to know that you'd been just as much a victim of that sick man's lies as the rest of us. I do not blame you."

traits.locale_text: 「シスター、正直に言う。虫けらのように串刺しにされたあの時、私もあなたの名前を呪った。何度もな。だが、あなたが私をあの杭から抜いてくれた時、その顔を一目見ただけで、あなたも私たち全員と同じように、狂人の嘘の犠牲者だったのだと理解できた。あなたを責めるつもりはない」
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: “修女，我和你说实话吧。当我落到他们手里，像臭虫一样被钉在钉子上的时候，我也一样诅咒了你，而且不止一次。不过，当你把我从桩子上救下来的时候，我看了你一眼就明白了，你也被那个该死的混蛋骗了。我一点都不怪你。”
languages.original_text: "Sister, I'll be honest with you. When I was there, being skewered on spikes like a bug, I cursed your name too. More than once. But when you were pulling me off those spikes, one look at your face was enough to know that you'd been just as much a victim of that sick man's lies as the rest of us. I do not blame you."

traits.locale_text: “修女，我和你说实话吧。当我落到他们手里，像臭虫一样被钉在钉子上的时候，我也一样诅咒了你，而且不止一次。不过，当你把我从钉子上救下来的时候，我看了你一眼就明白了，你也被那个该死的混蛋骗了。说真的，我一点都不怪你。”
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: «Hermana, seré sincero. Cuando estaba allí, siendo ensartado en pinchos como un insecto, yo también maldije su nombre. Más de una vez. Pero cuando me estaba sacando de esos pinchos, me bastó ver su cara un momento para saber que había sido tan víctima de las mentiras de ese enfermo como los demás. No le culpo».
languages.original_text: "Sister, I'll be honest with you. When I was there, being skewered on spikes like a bug, I cursed your name too. More than once. But when you were pulling me off those spikes, one look at your face was enough to know that you'd been just as much a victim of that sick man's lies as the rest of us. I do not blame you."

traits.locale_text: «Hermana, seré sincero. Cuando estaba allí, siendo ensartado en pinchos como un insecto, yo también maldije su nombre. Más de una vez. Pero cuando me estaba sacando de esos pinchos, me bastó ver su cara para comprender que había sido tan víctima de las mentiras de ese enfermo como todos nosotros. No le culpo».
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Schwester, ich will ehrlich sein. Als ich dort auf Pfähle aufgespießt wurde wie ein Käfer, da habe ich auch Euren Namen verflucht. Mehr als einmal. Aber als Ihr mich von diesen Pfählen heruntergezogen habt, musste ich Euch nur einmal ins Gesicht sehen und wusste, Ihr wart ebenso ein Opfer der Lügen dieses kranken Mannes wie der Rest von uns. Ich mache Euch deshalb keinen Vorwurf."
languages.original_text: "Sister, I'll be honest with you. When I was there, being skewered on spikes like a bug, I cursed your name too. More than once. But when you were pulling me off those spikes, one look at your face was enough to know that you'd been just as much a victim of that sick man's lies as the rest of us. I do not blame you."

traits.locale_text: "Schwester, ich will ehrlich sein. Als ich dort auf Pfähle aufgespießt wurde wie ein Käfer, da habe ich auch Euren Namen verflucht. Mehr als einmal. Aber als Ihr mich von diesen Pfählen heruntergezogen habt, da musste ich Euch nur ein einziges Mal ins Gesicht sehen, und mir war klar: Ihr wart ebenso ein Opfer der Lügen eines kranken Mannes wie wir alle. Ich mache Euch aber keine Vorwürfe."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: « Je ne vais pas vous mentir, ma sœur : pendant que je me faisais embrocher comme un goret, j'ai maudit votre nom, moi aussi. Et plus d'une fois. Mais quand vous m'avez descendu de ces piques, un seul regard m'a suffi pour comprendre que vous étiez vous aussi victime des mensonges de ce détraqué. Je ne vous en veux pas. »
languages.original_text: "Sister, I'll be honest with you. When I was there, being skewered on spikes like a bug, I cursed your name too. More than once. But when you were pulling me off those spikes, one look at your face was enough to know that you'd been just as much a victim of that sick man's lies as the rest of us. I do not blame you."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vais pas vous mentir, ma sœur : pendant que je me faisais embrocher comme un goret, j'ai maudit votre nom au même titre que les autres. Et plus d'une fois. Mais quand vous m'avez descendu de ces piques, un seul regard m'a suffi pour comprendre que vous étiez vous aussi victime des mensonges de ce détraqué. Donc je ne vous en veux pas. »
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Rahibe, seninle açık konuşacağım. Böcek gibi dikenlere şişlenmiş hâlde orada beklerken sana da lanet okudum, hem de çok defa. Ancak beni o dikenlerden çekerken yüzüne attığım tek bir bakış, tıpkı geri kalanlarımız gibi senin de o ruh hastası adamın yalanlarına kurban gittiğini anlamama yetti. Seni suçlamıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Sister, I'll be honest with you. When I was there, being skewered on spikes like a bug, I cursed your name too. More than once. But when you were pulling me off those spikes, one look at your face was enough to know that you'd been just as much a victim of that sick man's lies as the rest of us. I do not blame you."

traits.locale_text: "Rahibe, seninle açık konuşacağım. Böcek gibi dikenlere şişlenmiş bir hâlde orada beklerken sana da lanet okudum, hem de birçok defa. Ancak beni o dikenlerden çekerken yüzüne attığım tek bir bakış, tıpkı geri kalanlarımız gibi senin de o ruh hastası adamın yalanlarına kurban gittiğini anlamama yetti. Seni suçlamıyorum."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis
